mixed.oneOf: Field must be one of the following values: {{values}}
mixed.notOneOf: Field must not be one of the following values: {{values}}
mixed.notType: Field must match the configured type.

string.min: Field must be at least {{min}} characters
string.max: Field must be at most {{max}} characters
string.email: Field must be a valid email
string.url: Field must be a valid URL
string.uuid: Field must be a valid UUID
string.datetime: Field must be a valid ISO date-time
string.datetime_precision: Field must be a valid ISO date-time with a sub-second precision of exactly {{precision}} digits
string.datetime_offset: Field must be a valid ISO date-time with UTC "Z" timezone
string.trim: Field must be a trimmed string
string.lowercase: Field must be a lowercase string
string.uppercase: Field must be a upper case string

number.min: Field must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
number.max: Field must be less than or equal to {{max}}
number.positive: Field must be a positive number
number.negative: Field must be a negative number

date.min: Field field must be later than {{min}}
date.max: Field field must be at earlier than {{max}}

array.min: Field field must have at least {{min}} items
array.max: Field field must have less than or equal to {{max}} items
